tutorial.speak:
Let's walk through how to connect Lessons.Church to the B1 app.
First, you'll need to register or login to your Lessons.Church account.
If you haven't already, you'll need to register your church.
Make at least one schedule. You can create as many schedules as you want with as many classrooms as you have.
Now, click on your name and select "Switch App".
Next, click on Chums. You'll need to have access to Chums to complete this step. If you don't, please contact your Domain Admin.
Click on Plans.
Click the plus icon to add a new ministry.
Choose whatever name you would like and click Add.
Now click on Teams.
Again, click the plus icon to make a new team.
Click Add to create the team.
Click on the class you just created.
Now, add any teachers you want to view the lesson to this team.
Remember to click the add icon to save your changes.
Now, let's switch the app back to Lessons.Church.
Click "Edit" on the class where you want to add the volunteer team.
Choose the volunteer team you just organized.
Make sure to hit "Save" to complete the setup. Remember, whenever you add a new teacher, you will need to add them to the team in Plans on the Chums app.
To access B1 on your phone or tablet, you can download it from the Google Play Store or Apple App Store.
Search for B1.church in your device's app store.
Click Install to download the app.
Find your church in the app.
Click on your church to complete the setup.
That's it! Your app will now update every week with the correct lessons from Lessons.Church.
To see all this content in a regular browser or to share with parents or teachers, click Subscribe in Lessons.Church to get all the links you need.
